name: Billy The Penguin
description:
This is a 6 months prototype done in 2014 by 1rst year students at ENTI-UB for a non comercial purposes. 

Billy is a lovely penguin who has serious problems. He tries to escape from experiments and you will play his dreams due to the pills he is forced to take.  You will try to save your friends from the scientific researchers

Enjoy and have fun solving all the puzzles!
